latest_release.name: Spotibar v0.3
latest_release.body: Now two themes are available in one skin: Spotibar Mini and Spotibar Max + versions with background. ### Spotibar Mini: * Launch Spotify on icon, minimizes back to icon when Spotify is not running * Clicking on the current track and artist opens the Spotify window* * Control buttons: `Previous track` `Play/Pause` `Next track` * Volume control by mouse wheel when hovering over the player, right click turns off the sound ###### Requirements: Rainmeter 4.4, Windows 7+ ### Spotibar Max: * Launch Spotify on icon, minimizes back to icon when Spotify is not running * Clicking on the current track and artist opens the Spotify window* * Control buttons: `Previous track` `Play/Pause` `Next track` * Control buttons when hovering over the cover: `Like` `Repeat track` `Shuffle tracks` * Volume control by mouse wheel when hovering over the player, right click turns off the sound * Track progress and background version adapt to cover color ###### * Minimize the Spotify window rather than close it to work properly. Spotibar Max requires installation Spicetify to work, instructions on the [Spotibar](https://github.com/avenom/spotibar) main page ###### Requirements: Spicetify 1.2.1, Rainmeter 4.4, Windows 7+ ___ ???????????? ?? ?????????? ?????????? ???????????????? ?????? ????????: Spotibar Mini ?? latest_release.name: v1.3
latest_release.body:
- Added right alignment
- UI additions & improvements:
  - Added UI for colors + gradient customizations
  - Added functionality to select colors using ColorPickerUI (original by deathcrafter)
  - Adjusted certain values to be selectable instead of inputting manually
  - Adjusted overall text description, position & default font to improve user experience
  - Various bug fixes and improvements
- Changed default skin font to Jost
- Adjusted variables name & default values

latest_release.name: Initial Release
latest_release.body:
This is the skin in a Rainmeter-preferred .RMskin package for easy importing.

You will need to sign up for a free account with [weatherbit.io](http://weatherbit.io) and generate your own API key to have weather scraping work. Just pop it into the [Variables.inc](./@Resources/Variables.inc) file.

It also includes MSIAfterburner and WebNowPlaying plugins, and a default ConkyGemini layout.

latest_release.name: One Dark Pro Rainformer v1.0
latest_release.body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fhazal/RainMeter/commits/skin

Switch from Bestdori's API to Bandori.ga's. Added feature to switch between banner and logo image. This version *should* work no matter if the event is ongoing, completed, TBA, etc. (Only time will tell, but I am very confident this version should be the last major one) This version should also be more efficient.

latest_release.name: Update 2.1.0 - ???? Spotify gone, Spicetify here ????
latest_release.body:
###  **INFO: This update requires Rainmeter 4.3 (r3298) or higher**

This update is rather small but includes multiple smaller fixes, including a guide on how to change to Spicetify + WebNowPlaying to get Spotify working again. Many thanks to @tjhrulz and @khanhas for making this possible ???? 
## Changelog:

* **Fixed:** Replaced standalone Spotify plugin with Spicetify + WebNowPlaying. (#191, 247e489f70da4f8fa9297de674ad391210778852)
  For more information on how to migrate, click here: https://github.com/marcopixel/Monstercat-Visualizer/wiki/WebNowPlaying-Spotify

* **Fixed:** Song information had incorrect bounding box, made precise positioning impossible (5a876cfb568f2ddfcbe31a49513b4a7d456fa13c)
* **Fixed:** Clickable progress bar is back again ???? (331caf644cb51e06543ad7b7c2febcf13201e765)
* **Added:** New genres added to dynamic genre coloring (#211, thanks to @Franckyi)
* **Added:** Dynamic coloring now supports Windows Accent colors. (061c123ccda86441018ab1fec37b36105d59237f)
You can now use this to make the color change to your background image.

MD5: 6d131961dbc019f43514a7bd98459ce9

latest_release.name: Update 1.1.0 - How HOT is your system
latest_release.body:
There are a lot of changes in this new update so let's get right into the changelog:

- Added Scale parameter (you can properly size the skin now)
- Added CPU & GPU temperature skins
- Added quickaccess to hard drives (click on the hard drives letter to open)
- Added quickaccess to volume mixer (click on the speaker icon to open)
- Added variable for changing fonts
- Tweaked skin sizes (all normal modules now have the same height, allows for easier placement)
- Tweaked skin logic to improve performance (about 20% from 1.0.0)
- Reworked weather icons (to make them fit more to the other icons)
- Reworked media skins (the old one was not easily scalable to the other modules)
- Updated [Google Play Music Desktop Player Plugin](https://github.com/tjhrulz/GPMDP-Plugin) to 1.4.1.0
- Fixed media progress bar not showing the correct values
- Fixed volume slider not changing when moving it
- Fixed incorrect scaling of Download/Upload values
- Fixed that the volume is set to 0 when muting and then unmuting
- Fixed external ip showing wrong address when using proxy server
- Smaller tweaks and bugfixes

Many thanks to the contributers and please leave feedback/report issues :)

latest_release.body:
NEW:
    -Control your Web players such as Youtube, Soundcloud, GooglePlayMusic, AmazonMusic, Pandora, Tidal, Deezer, Plex using WebNowPlaying  browser plugin thanks to Trevor Hamilton.
    -Check the song title and artist name right on the EQClock
    -Toggle song repeat and playlist shuffle with one click

    -Elegant new design for paused mode
FIXED:
    -Spotify album art issue can be solved by installing Spicetify
REMOVED:
    -EQClock no longer shows CPU, RAM, Upload and Download meters

latest_release.name: The First Release
latest_release.body:
# RanPack v.0.1

RanPack has 5 packages

1. ranpack_v.0.1_rmskin_with_joke.zip (*Recommended*)
2. ranpack_v.0.1_full.zip: Raw Folder assets without rmskin , rainmeter_joke.exe included
3. rainmeter_joke.exe: Generate a random joke for RanPack joke widget (compiled executable, no python required)
4. ranpack_v.0.1.rmskin: Normal RmSkin setup (*Recommended for beginners*)
5. rainmeter_joke.py: Generate a random joke for RanPack joke widget (python required)

latest_release.name: v1.6.0
latest_release.body:
- Drive: Apparently HWiNFO can't provide Disk activity for logical disks. Also old issue with PerfMon providing values > 100 is solved by setting `MinValue` and `MaxValue`
- Player: Fix Artist and Title wrapping
- GPU: Fade usage string when value is `0`

latest_release.name: chaRm v1.2.0 "Dark Blue"
latest_release.body:
Changelog :

* Added a pause button if you need more performance or want to see your background image
* Compatibility verified with Rainmeter 4.3 Release (r3298)

??? **Latest Rainmeter 4.4 beta required**

**Cleartext 6.0** brings a completely new look and feel to the entire experience, with enhancements in performance.

* New Settings panel: more compact and more reactive to variable toggles, simpler color management
* New typeface: better support for international text
* Smooth Scroll on regular Cleartext
* Center alignment on regular Cleartext & Cleartext Pure
* Dynamic Disable: unused player plugins are disabled to reduce overhead CPU usage
* Dynamic Update: increased skin update only when scrolling is active, otherwise kept to a minimum

7.4.0 - 2022-09-23

latest_release.name: v1.0.0
latest_release.body:
1.0.0 - 2021-01-01
* Initial release.

***Requires Rainmeter 4.4-r3412-beta or later.***

latest_release.name: v7.5.0
latest_release.body:
7.5.0 - 2022-11-04
* Corrected Weather Meter issue (again) that prevented automatic region detection from working and could cause the gadget to fail.
* Corrected All CPU Meter display issue on systems where the Show Usage Per Logical Core option was unchecked and the CPU had more than 16 cores.
* Enhanced All CPU Meter to add option to show from 1 to 5 top processes by CPU usage.
* Enhanced All CPU Meter to allow showing/hiding the fan graph.
* Enhanced All CPU Meter to allow showing/hiding RAM and Page File statistics and/or usage.
* Enhanced GPU Meter to allow showing/hiding VRAM statistics and/or usage.
* Corrected GPU Meter regression that could crash Rainmeter when using multiple GPU Meter skins with different configurations.
* Corrected Network Meter gadgets calculation for peak throughput.
* Enhanced Network Meter gadgets to add option to show ping times and link to a speed test website (optional).
* Enhanced Network Meter gadgets to add visible indicator when IP addresses are hidden.

***Requires Rainmeter 4.5.16 or later.***

---
#### Upgrade Notes
If upgrading an existing Gadgets installation:
+ **All CPU Meter**: Due to internal changes, you may need to reselect your preferences for displaying RAM and page file stats.
+ **Network Meter** or **Wireless Meter**: You will need to reset the "Ping Color" value (currently unused gray color) to its new yellow-orange color. Middle-mouse click the color to reset it.
+ **Network Meter Pro** and **Wireless Meter Pro**: The NetMonitor service has **_not_** been updated in this release. Upgrading the service is optional. To upgrade, use the Network Settings to stop the service, uninstall it, and then reinstall.
---

latest_release.name: Major bug fix
latest_release.body:
In this release, I've adressed some major bugs and fully rewritten the parser code to further improve RSS feed stability. It is now able to parse **almost every** RSS feed on Reddit there is. This bugfix is a huge improvement, so I decided to release it as its own version. 

## What's new
- Completely new RSS parser module
- Twitch Live skin now supports relative positioning

## Special thanks
@hiimkir - betatesting and documentation improvement

latest_release.name: User Greetings [v1.3.3]
latest_release.body:
## Update v1.3.3 - User greetings (Nov 11, 2022)

### Additions
- Added a greeting skin that changes based on time

### Fixes
- Reversed the day of the month and month so it is in the correct order (date/date and time skins)

# Release v3.1.0

Requires Rainmeter 4.2 or above
Hover mouse cursor to the top of the screen to activate, right click Launcher Settings to change variables.

----

Changes:

* Skin organization restructure (again)
* Fixed a problem that caused the launcher to unload when Rainmeter closes/restarts
* Fixed launcher examples
